title: Game wont start after champion select
body: I have been trying all kinds of fixes for this issue and I've been going to custom games to see if my game is finally fixed, but nothing happens. I chose my champion and when the loading screen is supposed to show up absolutely NOTHING happens! Please help, I've looked at older threads and they haven't been of much help.

replies.body: Having this problem too and its like the 8th issue ive had with league this month. Honestly i might just quit the game than have to deal with both fixing it, and then playing off the 5 20minute queues ive racked up for all the times ive unfairly been disconnected (or not even connected in the first place) for whatever reason.

Usually, when your client doesn't start loading into the match, it's due to a poor connection to the server. Worry not! This can commonly be resolved by the steps in our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps helped you out.
I tried all the steps, unfortunately they didn't work. Game wont do anything after champion select still.
It is on my hidden icons running after I tried to see if it worked. I open it up and it says "Game is still in progress..."

Since the connection guide didn't resolve your issue, I recommend reaching out to our tech specialists by [creating a ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) Attaching a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) will provide our techs with a good amount of information to assist you in resolving this.
I think the new patch fixed it, it works now. Instead of making Skins please fix your client its crazy how many issues it has and im sure im going to run into alot more of them.

I'm having the same issue, however I've been flagged as leaver 2 times now due to it never moving past the 0 in the countdown to the game start. I have gone through a majority of the posts today and nothing is being given as a fix other than riot telling us its our "connections".  I am currently running a repair on the client to see if that will fix it but please look for a better answer than it is our connection, the only thing that has been changed on my computer since yesterday when i played last was your patch. something is corrupting/corrupted not allowing me to connect or even get to the loading screen to start a game.

went under the help option in the client and ran a repair to the client... took about 5-10 min and seems to be working now got into the game no problems this time.. somthing on the file needed to be corrected from the patch.
The repair is going to take a while lol. Crazy that it took you 5-10 mins. Hopefully it works if not, maybe the next patch will somehow fix it.

Yeah, Im just desperate for a fix so i just did all that stuff he said. But now it seems like he didn't diagnose my problem very well because it isn't a connection problem. I'll try the repair, im not sure if i've tried that yet and I probably should of a while ago.
